resources.string: You are just one click away from appetizing dishes
Your Order Has Been Placed Successfully.

This is a food ordering app. This app can be used by canteens of different institutions and offices to order their lunch by doing their work. It will save their time and people can also keep a check on their eating habits. 
In this hypothetical canteen, named The Canteen there are two there are two categories available. Clicking on the image will get you to the page of your choice menu. For now, you will able to select only one item. Then in the cart, you will see your final amount to be paid. 

In this application has been made by using Recycler View, Data Binding, Fragments, Navigation, View Model concepts.
